name: The Deep Tale Of A Herculean Hero
name_original: The Deep Tale Of A Herculean Hero
description:
Some of you may say that my game is a pale copy of Nuclear Thrones

And you would have been right if this game did not hide a secret, much darker than many other games'

(If you don't know Nuclear Thrones, it's a top down shooter developed by Vlambeer go check it out!)
